definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: haste, make haste (As. ḫâšu, Dl:Pr 180, Eth h.osa:; on this vb. V. Nö:ZMG 1883, 538)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[חָשׁ]] De 32:35 (or Pt., but v. Di), 1 S [[חַשְׁתִּי]] Ps 119:60; Impf. 3 fs. [[וַתַּ֫חַשׁ]] (sic!) Job 31:5 Ges:§ 72 R. 9; Imv. [[חוּ֫שָׁה]] 1Sa 20:38 + 6 t. Psalm, + Ps 71:12 Qr (Kt [[חישׁה]]); Inf. sf. [[חוּשִׁי]] Job 20:2; Pt. act. [[חָשׁ]] Hb Hab 1:8 + Is 8:1, Is 8:3 in n.pr.; pass. [[חֻשִׁיּס]] Nu 32:17; but v. infr.:—make haste De 32:35 (‖[[קרוב]]), Ps 119:60; in prophetic n.pr. [[מַהֵר שָׁלָל חָשׁ בַּז֑]] Is 8:1, Is 8:3; of eagle (in sim. of Chald. army) [[נשׁר חשׁ לאכול]] Hb Hab 1:8; Job 31:5 subj. [[רנל]], sq. [[על־מרמה]]; [[חוּשִׁי בּי]] Job 20:2 my haste in me, i.e. my inward excitement—esp. Imv. 1Sa 20:38 (‖[[מהרה ]]), and in Psalm Psalm: sq. [[לְעַזְרָתִי]] Ps 22:20, Ps 38:23, Ps 40:14, Ps 70:2, Ps 71:12 (Qr); sq. [[לִי]] Ps 70:5, Ps 141:1; pt. pass. [[נֵחָלֵץ חֻשִׁים]] Nu 32:17, but prob. for [[חֲמֻשִׁים]] (Kn Di comp. Ex 13:18 etc.); Ba:NB 180 retains [[חוּשִׁים]] and regards it as act. (intrans.) = hastening.

shew haste, act quickly Ju Jdg 20:37; hasten, come quickly Is 5:19 (subj. [[מַעֲשֵׂהוּ]], ‖[[יְמַהֵר]]; others: let him hasten on his work), [[יׇחִישׁ]] Is 28:16 hasten away (flee), or hasten about distractedly (si vera l.; Che Guthe rd. [[ימישׁ]] yield, give way).
transit. c. sf. Is 60:22 I will hasten it; c. acc. Ps 55:9 I would hasten (= secure quickly) my escape.
